comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: In February, 1914, entrants from the North Shrewsbury and South Shrewsbury Ice Yacht Clubs contended for the annual North American Ice Yacht championship over a twenty-mile course on the Shrewsbury River, at Red Bank, New Jersey. Here's the New York Times report of the goings-on, February 16, 1914: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=940CE...

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo from the ice yacht championship contests on the Shrewsbury River at Red Bank, New Jersey, February, 1914:
